main event: A witness observed a bright light in the sky that suddenly disappeared over Sidney, Ohio on September 8, 1962.
interesting points: The object was moving across the sky at a high rate of speed and seemed to be shooting out a bright light or beam.
The witness, Sgt. Sidney Truesdale, is a trained observer and his report is considered to be reliable.
Sgt. Truesdale stated the object was not an airplane and did not have the characteristics of any known aircraft.
The object disappeared suddenly while the witness was watching it.
